resources.string: Internet access required for the first run. \n Sure to connect Internet? Or just leave this app.
Cannot access to the Internet, please check your Internet connection and retry or leave this app.
Download and update data from http://e.tju.edu.cn/. Internet connection is required.
Get the latest version of week list and building list. For consistency, all of the cached data of study room will be deleted by performing this action. Internet connection is required.
This action will set a flag that this app has not initialized yet, which means all the data cached will be deleted the next time you start this app.\nSure to continue?

Downloading %1$d of %2$d items.

Total Pages:	 %3$d 
Pages Cached:	 %4$d 
Pages Remain:	 %5$d 

Current Task:	 %6$s 
Tasks Remain:	 %7$d 

Total Per Cents:	 %8$d %%
Hello World!… …\n\n If you need help, just try it by yourself. Then write your experience down and replace this page, that is \"HELP\"!
No data of this week.\nPlease cache them at Data Management page.
